attributes.action: Make it compulsory to call a General Election should a Prime Minister die,resign or retire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nobody ever voted for you to be Prime Minister so what right do you have to hold the position without the consent of the electorate.
It should be they who decide who is competent and not passed down by the outgoing PM/Governing Party.

rejection.details: We appreciate your petition may not be the same as this one, but there are overlaps. Have you considered adding your signature to this instead http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/please-go/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
